item.title: Mind dump: The last few months
item.description:
It's interesting how life just happens. It clich√© but it's true. One moment your having a margarita, the next minute you find out your little family is about to be a lot less little.

I mostly just want to mind dump some thoughts and maybe I'll elaborate on them later and maybe I won't.
